name: PiPiPi-Pizza!
description:
Do you like pizzas? 

You are a chef who has to throw pizzas to the people who want them. But beware, it's not as easy as it looks. You have to skate around, dodging obstacles . 

The goal is to give pizza to as many people as possible in 60 seconds. Can you do it?

  • Move: wasd
  • Throw: space
  • Fullscreen:  f12
